full_summary:
### W6856-22V303 - Rental Services of Dump Trucks and Operators
#### Announcement
##### Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3717412041
* **Reference Number:** WS3717412041-Doc3718573589
* **Publication Date:** October 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 7, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 24, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 23, 2023

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the rental services of 10 and/or 12 wheel dump trucks with their respective operators. The services are required for the DND in Valcartier and Quebec City.

##### Solicitation Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

The bid must include all required supporting documentation and must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EST on the tender closing date. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

##### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Name:** Deslauriers, Annie (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

##### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to contractors who meet the trade agreements outlined in the notice. The trade agreements include the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

##### Regions of Opportunity

This solicitation is limited to Quebec.

### Notice
The complete notice can be accessed [here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14431158?extsite=MTQ0MzExNThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
